section.title: Tutorial: Using the camera API
section.para: In this tutorial you create application which allows you to make a photo via the front camera and to save it on the SD card.

tip.para: If you using the Android emulator ensure that you configured the camera and that you added an SD card during the creation of the your Android virtual device.

section.para: Create a new Android project called de.vogella.camera.api with an activity called MakePhotoActivity .
Add the android.permission.CAMERA permission to access your camera and the android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE to be able to write to the SD card to your AndroidManifest.xml file.
